relation: Norfolk State is 20 minutes from the beach. An upscale mall is less than 10 minutes from campus. Washington DC is three hours away. So, there are tons of things to do for fun.
Norfolk State campus has fast dining, main cafeteria, and Chick Filet.
Norfolk State provide several dorm options. The dorm staff members are helpful and make the dorm experience pleasant.
The honors college provide challenging course embracing rigor and relevence.
The honors college is a great opportunity. I have enjoyed the extra curriculum activities provided by the honors college.
Norfolk State is a very motivating college. The teachers use many engaging styles of delivering lesions. Norfolk State is safe and secure school.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {405511=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 175383=Brown hall is the oldest building on campus, has been here since about 1935., 145354=Athletic- Basketball, Baseball, Football, Bowling, Tennis, etc. (NSU held 5 MEAC titles in 2011-2012), 30719=i like the pass and review that the marching band does during the home games. although they play a lot of old school music, their marching style differs from other schools because they march military style and this is refreshing from other college bands. i wish they could get enough votes to attend the honda battle of the college bands so people in other areas can see them., 342182=Depends on where and when you go. Everything revolves and around meal plan, which happens three times a day: 730-930, 11-130, and 430 - 730 during the weekday, and 1030-130 and 430-630 on the weekends. You have the big cafÃ© and small cafÃ© (close from Friday evening -sun), the small cafÃ©, the student center (chic-fil-a, tropical smoothie, and pizza hut), Spartan Station (burgers, burritos, and subs) and the Bodega which doesn't have meal plan, but is perfect for late night dining when you have dining dollars have Spartan bucks. After awhile it gets old and you'll be begging your parents for money to eat off campus.}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students Norfolk State University is great for students who want to get a headstart in the world. This institution breeds leaders and develops positive, hard-working, contributing members of society. NSU is known for its excellent Nursing Program and its nationally renowned Music Program. This university is for students who want to learn in a well-rounded, student-friendly, family-oriented environment. It is great for students who stand out amongst their peers and would like to continue making their mark on the world. Tips for prospective students My biggest suggestion for new freshmen entering college would be not to underestimate college life. When most people tell you about college, they only tell you the good stuff. They tell you about the parties, the staying-up-late, the long weekends, but they fail to tell you about the hours of commitment to studying it takes to pass classes. In return, a lot of students enter college life unprepared for the work load. Also, come prepared to be your own person and live your own life. Your parents can no longer wake you up in the morning or call your teachers to discuss your grades. When you step onto a college campus, the responsibility is placed in your hands and it is up to you to make the most of your higher learning experience. Bang for the buck
